text: Solɨn otarim Jonatan, an otarir vamɨra iti, an ziam Mefiboset.4:4 Gumazir kamɨn ziam, a Meribal. (Nɨ 1 Eghaghaniba 8:34ɨn gan.) Ziar kamɨn akuar abuananam, a, “Bal,” an asemɨn ziam. Ezɨ gɨn me ua ziar kam Bal osiran aghua, egha a giragha kamaghɨn osiri, “Boset.” An akar kamɨn mɨrara ghu, “Aghumsɨzir Bizim.” Ezɨ gumazir kamɨn ziam kamaghɨn oto, “Meriboset,” o “Mefiboset.” Mefiboset 5plan azeniba itima, Sol ko Jonatan areme. Dughiar kamɨn, Jesrilɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumaziba, me Jonatanɨn adarazi bagha akam amaga ghaze, Jonatanɨn apaniba a mɨsoghezɨma an areme. Ezɨ an adarazi akar kam baraki, ezɨ amizir Mefibosetɨn garim a inigha arav ghu. Amizim pamtemɨn ivemarima, Mefiboset degiaghirɨ, egha datɨrɨghɨn an dagarimning an ikufi.
